attrs.name: left-top-min
attrs.desc: Minimum threshold on the left or upper panel.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is 40px.

attrs.name: mode
attrs.desc: Separation type. The value can be horizontal or vertical. The default value is horizontal. ;The optional values of this attribute are horizontal / vertical
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is horizontal.

attrs.name: right-bottom-min
attrs.desc: Minimum threshold on the right or lower panel.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is 40px.

attrs.name: modelValue
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is 0.5.

events.name: moveend
events.desc: Drag end event. ;Drag end event. ;No arguments

events.name: movestart
events.desc: Drag start event. ;Drag start event. ;No arguments

events.name: moving
events.desc: Draging events. ;Drag the event in. ; arg1:event (type Object)
